        </BillingInformation>
      </CreditCardData>
      <Email Address="customer@customer.com" NameNumber="1.1" Type="TO"/>

        <GivenName>JOY</GivenName>
        <Surname>FERNANDOWSKI</Surname>

  <AirBook>

      <FlightSegment FlightNumber="4526" ArrivalDateTime="2025-05-08T23:58:00" DepartureDateTime="2025-05-08T20:15:00" Status="NN" NumberInParty="1" ResBookDesigCode="Y" InstantPurchase="true">
        <DestinationLocation LocationCode="MCO"/>
        <MarketingAirline Code="F9" FlightNumber="4526"/>

        <OperatingAirline Code="F9"/>

      </FlightSegment>
    </OriginDestinationInformation>
  </AirBook>
  <AirPrice>
    <PriceRequestInformation Retain="true">
      <OptionalQualifiers>
        <FlightQualifiers>
          <VendorPrefs>
            <Airline Code="F9"/>
          </VendorPrefs>
        </FlightQualifiers>
        <PricingQualifiers CurrencyCode="USD">
          <PassengerType Code="ADT" Quantity="1"/>
        </PricingQualifiers>
      </OptionalQualifiers>
    </PriceRequestInformation>

      </RemarkInfo>
    </AddRemark>

            <IssueCountry>US</IssueCountry>
            <NationalityCountry>US</NationalityCountry>
          </Document>
          <PersonName DateOfBirth="1987-01-01" Gender="M" NameNumber="1.1">

    </SpecialService>
  </SpecialReqDetails>
  <PostProcessing>
    <EndTransaction>

    </EndTransaction>
    <RedisplayReservation waitInterval="1000" returnExtendedPriceQuote="true"/>
  </PostProcessing>
</CreatePassengerNameRecordRQ>
